00049 inline Type_Face Segment_axi::type_face(int i) const
00050 {
00051   assert(i==0);
00052   if(i!=0)
00053     {
00054       Cerr << "A segment has not " << i << " types of face" << finl;
00055       exit();
00056     }
00057   return Faces::point_1D_axi;
00058 }
